# DictationTranscriber.TranscriptionOption.etiquetteReplacements

**Case**

Replaces certain words and phrases with a redacted form.

## Declaration

```swift
case etiquetteReplacements
```

## Discussion

If included, a phrase recognized as an expletive would be transcribed with asterisks.

## Transcription options

- **DictationTranscriber.TranscriptionOption.emoji**: Transcribes named emoji as emoji.
- **DictationTranscriber.TranscriptionOption.punctuation**: Automatically punctuates the transcription.
title: DictationTranscriber.TranscriptionOption.etiquetteReplacements
